events.name: input
events.description: native `input` event fired by a textarea

events.name: eds-textarea-value
events.description: fires on `value` change in the text field

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Default value of the disabled state

properties.name: error
properties.description: Default value of the error state

properties.name: maxlength
properties.description: Maximum character length allows within the textarea

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: Default placeholder text inside the textarea

properties.name: readonly
properties.description: Option to make the textarea readonly

properties.name: required
properties.description: Default value of the required state

properties.name: resizable
properties.description: Option to make the textarea resizable

properties.name: restrictMaxLength
properties.description: Enforces the maximum length setting, and stops accepting user input in the textarea.

properties.name: rows
properties.description: Number of rows for the textarea

properties.name: state
properties.description:
State of the textarea, `regular` by default. Valid values are:
- `regular`: makes the textarea enabled and allows input
- `error`: Adds an error-state border to draw attention to a problem
- `disabled`: Adds a disabled state

EDSTextarea.description: The **text area** is a form element that is used to display, enter, or edit large quantities (multiple lines) of text.
EDSTextarea.name: Textarea
EDSTextarea.usage:
The following CSS variables are available for styling:

CSS Variable | Description
:----------------|:-------------
--eds-textbox-text-color | Text color for textarea
--eds-textbox-background-color | Background color for textarea
--eds-textbox-border-color | Default border color for textarea
--eds-textbox-hover-border-color | Border color for textbox in hover state
--eds-textbox-placeholder-color | Text color for placeholder text in textarea
--eds-textbox-disabled-placeholder-color | Text color for placeholder text in disabled textarea
--eds-textbox-error-border-color | Border color on error state of textarea
--eds-textbox-border-focused-color | Border color on focus state of textarea
--eds-textbox-disabled-text-color | Text color for disabled textarea
--eds-textbox-disabled-background-color | Background color for disabled textarea
--eds-textbox-helper-color | Text color for helper message in textarea

events.name: input
events.description: native `input` event fired by a textarea

events.name: eds-textarea-value
events.description: fires on `value` change in the text field
